list.name: Default
list.comment:
adding mysql jar to Spark query core-db
works if using this from host ``` sshuttle -l 0.0.0.0 --dns -r nick@o.scivulcan.com:5500 192.81.130.200/32 ``` "java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: com.mysql.jdbc.Driver"
add mysql dependency to original semantive images
adding mysql jdbc connector to application itself (instead)
runs !
run on dev3
